title: [Large-scale] Simulation-Based Learning for Output Constraint Control of Robotic Manipulators

context.prior_knowledge: Control systems fundamentals, basic robotics concepts, and MATLAB/Simulink basics
context.additional_context: Flexible learning environment for remote workers, utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically define output constraints of robotic manipulators and implement them in simulation environments
Learners can design Barrier Function-based state feedback controllers to apply control algorithms meeting safety requirements
Learners can verify and refine hybrid control strategies combining Iterative Learning Control (ILC) with state feedback in simulations

resources: Robotic Manipulator Simulation Software (Simulink Robotics System Toolbox)
Case-Based Learning Materials (Rehabilitation Robot EMU Model)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
